Returns: A String containing the namespace of the attribute, or null if th attribute cannot be found.
Parameters: int: Index of the desired attribute, 0...count-1.
getAttributeNamespace(int).Description: Returns the namespace of the specified attribute. See also @B_org#xmlpull#v1#XmlPullParser#getAttributeNamespace_E@, which this method corresponds to when parsing a compiled XML file.

close().Description: Close this parser. Calls on the interface are no longer valid after this call.

ClassDesc: The XML parsing interface returned for an XML resource. This is a standard @B_org#xmlpull#v1#XmlPullParser_E@ interface but also extends @B_android#util#AttributeSet_E@ and adds an additional @B_android#content#res#XmlResourceParser#close_E@ method for the client to indicate when it is done reading the resource.
